law.catch_line: Jurisdiction in criminal and civil cases involving theft of identity and trafficking in stolen identities.
law.text: The Attorney General shall have concurrent jurisdiction with Commonwealth's attorneys and county attorneys for the prosecution of offenses under and the enforcement of the provisions of KRS 411.210, 434.872, 434.874, 514.160, 514.170, and 532.034.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 175, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 174, sec. 5, effective July 14, 2000.
